moduleDescription: Continuing with the skills and knowledge attained in MUA4173 Audio for Media 1, MUA4174 Audio for Media 2 provides students more hands on experience of audio recording and editing techniques for the video programs. Students will be requested to finish at least 2 projects of audio production for video programs within the semester.
faculty: YONG SIEW TOH CONSERVATORY OF MUSIC
department: YONG SIEW TOH CONSERVATORY OF MUSIC
